description: A dangerous sea at the beginning of the New World, also known as the 'Ill-Tempered Sea.' The name derives from French 'mauvaise humeur' meaning 'bad temper,' reflecting its volatile nature. Known for extreme and unpredictable weather phenomena including mirages, giant raindrops and hailstones larger than warships, snowfall like an avalanche, and the ocean separating to create spontaneous trenches. Features the Thrust Up Stream, a scaled-down version of the Knock Up Stream.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Enter Maubeugemour Sea
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats enter the dangerous Maubeugemour Sea and Nami warns the crew about its notorious weather phenomena.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the setting for the Z's Ambition Arc.

keyEvents.title: Extreme Weather Phenomena
keyEvents.description: The crew experiences the sea's extreme weather including giant hailstones, massive snowfall, and the ocean splitting apart.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the dangerous conditions of the New World.

keyEvents.title: Marine Convoy Spotted
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats spot the Marine convoy transporting Panz Fry through the Maubeugemour Sea toward Impel Down.

statusHistory.reason: Ongoing dangerous sea in the New World

description: A warship commanded by Ain and Binz, part of a large fleet of Neo Marine vessels gathering in the New World. The ship serves as a command center for Neo Marine operations.

keyEvents.title: Neo Marine Ship Debut
keyEvents.description: Ain and Binz are shown commanding a fleet of Neo Marine ships in the New World.
keyEvents.significance: Introduction of the Neo Marines' naval forces.

keyEvents.title: Shuzo's Communication with Ain
keyEvents.description: Shuzo contacts Ain from his submarine to reveal his plan to kill Panz Fry.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the internal rivalry within Neo Marines.

description: A steel submarine commanded by Shuzo, with the Neo Marine insignia imprinted at the front. Shuzo commands an entire fleet of torpedo-like submersibles to carry his platoons.

keyEvents.title: Shuzo's Submarine Debut
keyEvents.description: Shuzo is introduced commanding his submarine fleet, separate from the main Neo Marine force.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Shuzo's independent command and resources.

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' second ship, built by Franky using treasure wood from the Adam Tree. In this episode, the ship traverses the dangerous Maubeugemour Sea.

keyEvents.title: Food Mysteriously Disappears
keyEvents.description: The crew discovers their food is vanishing mysteriously from the Thousand Sunny.
keyEvents.significance: Leads to the discovery of Lily Enstomach.

keyEvents.title: Lily Found on Thousand Sunny
keyEvents.description: Luffy discovers Lily stealing food on the ship.
keyEvents.significance: Where the main character of the arc is introduced.
